main.description:
Savor the succulent flavors of the land’s harvest and the ocean’s bounty at the Firefish Restaurant. Delight in a medley of fresh seafood and tender meats served with the goodness of fruits and vegetables coupled with organically-grown herbs and spices from the resort’s own garden. Firefish Restaurant’s menu features local and international dishes prepared by a young and vibrant culinary team.
Enjoy coastal cuisine amid the restaurant’s cozy ambiance then have a drink or two at the Firefish Lounge. Special gatherings by the beach and island picnics may be arranged as well.

attributes.title: Extend Your Stay for Work and Play

main.description:
How about a remote office or school set-up in Boracay Island? Yes, it’s possible at Discovery Boracay.Escape the confines of the four walls of your home and give work-life balance a new meaning. We took care of the details this digitally connected world demands so you can divide your time for work and play.

 

Promo Code: EXTEND

 

In between power meetings or busy school sessions, you can bask under the golden rays of the sun with the powdery white sand in between your toes or you can take a quick refreshing dip at the pool. At sunset, head to the 360 Roof Lounge or Sand Bar and cap your day with a glass or two of your favorite cocktail while watching the paraw glide gracefully with the beautiful sunset.

With the endless possibilities as your canvas, paint your picture perfect work-from-home background with the sea, sky and sun right outside your suite.

Whether staying with the family or enjoying solitary bliss, indulge in a host of exclusive benefits and make Discovery Boracay your home in breathtaking Boracay.

 

For Stays from 7 to 13 Consecutive Nights

RATE PER NIGHT:

  • Junior Suite: Php 11,900
  • One Bedroom Premier: Php 14,700
  • Signature One Bedroom Suite: Php 22,890

EXCLUSIVE BENEFITS:

  • Daily breakfast at Sands Restaurant for two persons
  • Roundtrip land and boat transfers from and to Caticlan Airport for two persons
  • Personalized service from our Chief Joy Officers
  • Complimentary 60-minute massage for two (2) persons (once per stay)
  • Complimentary minibar (one full set-up per stay)
  • A complimentary bottle of house wine (once per stay)
  • Complimentary set dinner for two at the Clubhouse Deck (once per stay)

For Stays 14 to 29 Consecutive Nights

RATE PER NIGHT:

  • Junior Suite: Php 10,900
  • One Bedroom Premier: Php 13,700
  • Signature One Bedroom Suite: Php 21,890

EXCLUSIVE BENEFITS:

  • Daily breakfast at Sands Restaurant for two persons
  • Roundtrip land and boat transfers from and to Caticlan Airport for two persons
  • Personalized service from our Chief Joy Officers
  • Complimentary 60-minute massage for two (2) persons (once per stay)
  • Complimentary weekly minibar replenishment
  • A complimentary bottle of premium wine (once per stay)
  • Complimentary set dinner for two at Clubhouse Deck

 

Terms and Conditions

  • Above rates are subject to 12% tax and 10% service charge
  • A minimum stay is required to avail of this special rate, depending on the tier level indicated above.
  • In case that guest would want to cut their stay (less than 7 or 14 nights), regular rate or other existing promotions will apply. Inclusions that have been availed will be charged to the personal charge of the guests.
  • A surcharge of PHP 4,000++ per night will apply during Super Peak periods and dates as identified by the hotel.
  • Extra person charge is at PHP 3,000++ for regular suites and PHP 3,300++ for Signature Suite, inclusive of daily breakfast and roundtrip land & boat airport transfers. Should extra person avails of the other inclusions such as dinner or spa, regular rate shall apply.
  • Cancellations and modifications should be advised at least 7 days prior to arrival to avoid cancellation charges equivalent to full stay
  • Prepayment is required upon reservation.
  • This offer cannot be used in conjunction with other promotions or discounts. Senior citizen or PWD discount of 20% off will no longer apply. However, VAT Exemption shall be extended.

 

Enhance your stay by pre-booking special offers that will surely delight the senses. Simply click on the “Add to My Stay” button on your online room booking.

For Inquiries:

Call Reservation: (63) 917 627 3780 | (632) 7719 6692 | 6693 | 6694 | 6695 |

Contact Email: reservations@dsb.discovery.com.ph

main.description:
Toast to a well-deserved vacation with a refreshing cocktail or an ice-cold beer. Sitting across Coron’s lovely landscapes and turquoise waters, the Dugong Bar offers an eclectic selection of wines, cocktails, spirits and non-alcoholic beverages. Lounging options abound for those who want to bask in the sun while a number of indoor entertainment including billiards, table tennis, darts and foosball await guests.

The Dugong Bar is the perfect spot to enjoy the island’s wondrous sunset.

Summer fun has begun!

It’s the perfect time to breathe in the refreshing sea breeze, soak up the rejuvenating rays of the sun and dive into the turquoise waters of one of the best islands in the country.

Let the beautiful island of Boracay make your summer vacation truly an unforgettable one. Have a splashing good time with friends and family and experience memorable moments to satisfy your wanderlust. Enjoy daily breakfast, complimentary drinks, boodle fight at Sands Restaurant and more.

 

Promo Code: HAPPY

DTI Fair Trade Permit No. FTEB-187301 Series of 2024

 

Happy Summer Suite Offers

  • Junior Suite at Php 14,999++ per night
  • Signature One Bedroom Suite at Php 27,888++ per night

Inclusions for Suite Bookings

  • Daily breakfast at Sands Restaurant for two persons
  • Round trip airport transfers for two persons from and to Caticlan Airport
  • Pastas of Rome for two at Forno Osteria Restaurant (once per stay)
  • Happy Summer drinks for two at Bogart’s Bar (once per stay)

 

Terms and Conditions

  • Rates are subject to 10% service charge and 12% government taxes
  • A minimum of two-night stay is required for this promotion to apply. Should guests prefer to stay more than 2 nights, the same rates above will be used, but inclusions will apply only every 2 nights extension.
  • Kids 7 years old and below are free of charge when sharing room with parents/adults with no extra bed requirement.
  • Guests 8 years old and above will have an extra person charge of PHP 3,000++ for regular suites, and Php 3,300++ for Signature Suites, inclusive of breakfast and roundtrip airport transfers. Regular rate will apply should they wish to avail of the other inclusions.
  • Unused inclusions are non-refundable and cannot be converted to any services rendered by the hotel.
  • Prepayment upon reservation is required.
  • Reservation is non-cancellable but can be rebooked within the promotional period. Rebooking must be done at least 14 days prior to arrival to avoid penalty charges equivalent to full stay. If new dates are not within the promotional period, the payment can be used as hotel credits for future stay.
  • Senior citizen or PWD discount of 20% off will no longer apply. However, VAT Exemption shall be extended and applied during the event proper. Copy of the Senior / PWD ID should be presented to avail of the VAT Exemption during the event proper. If the Senior / PWD card holder will not be present upon check-in, the VAT will be collected accordingly.

Booking Period: March 1 to June 15, 2024

Stay Period: March 1 to July 31, 2024. Black-out dates apply.

 

For Inquiries:

Call for Reservation: (63) 917 627 3780 | (632) 7719 6692 | 6693 | 6694 | 6695 |

Contact Email: reservations@dsb.discovery.com.ph

Toast to a well-deserved vacation with a refreshing cocktail or an ice-cold beer. Sitting across Coron’s lovely landscapes and turquoise waters, the Dugong Bar offers an eclectic selection of wines, cocktails, spirits and non-alcoholic beverages. Lounging options abound for those who want to bask in the sun while a number of indoor entertainment including billiards, table tennis, darts and foosball await guests.
The Dugong Bar is the perfect spot to enjoy the island’s wondrous sunset.
